data.description: Create Test Scripts which Generate Log Files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Test.pm is no longer maintained, and has several hacks built into
    it, which are no longer necessary.

    Test::Simple and Test::More supposedly replace Test.pm, but use a
    completely different interface.

    Test::Debugger is built using the same interface as Test.pm, with
    an added object-oriented interface. It also adds the ability for
    test scripts to easily generate a log file of failed tests.
